other_tests.findings: Liver demonstrates normal echotexture without focal lesions. There is no evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The CBD is of normal caliber measuring 3 mm. The portal vein is patent demonstrating hepatopetal flow. The gallbladder is mildly distended. There is a 12 mm gallstone within its lumen, unchanged. There is no pericholecystic fluid collection or gallbladder wall edema. The pancreas is unremarkable. The right kidney measures 11.4 cm and is normal. Visualized intra-abdominal aorta and IVC are normal in caliber. There is no ascites.
